title: WHERE Filter
subtitle: Scan + match using comparison operators
methodology: Scan 5K rows, filter by age > 30 AND score < 50. PreparedQuery pre-compiles filters for zero-allocation execution. Measured: Sharc 0.236ms vs SQLite 0.551ms (2.3x).
whyItMatters: WHERE filters are the bread-and-butter of agent queries. PreparedQuery eliminates parse + filter construction overhead, achieving 2.3x faster with zero GC pressure.

title: GC Pressure - Sustained Scan
subtitle: Heap allocation under continuous load
methodology: Scan 5K integer rows sustained with PreparedReader. Measured: Sharc 0.168ms/0B vs SQLite 0.798ms/688B. Sharc 4.8x faster with zero allocation.
whyItMatters: In WASM, GC pauses freeze the entire tab. PreparedReader achieves true zero-allocation scans, eliminating GC jank entirely.

title: Encrypted Read
subtitle: AES-256-GCM + Argon2id KDF decrypt + read
methodology: Open encrypted .db, derive key (Argon2id), decrypt page-level AES-256-GCM, read 100 rows.
whyItMatters: Agent memory often contains sensitive data (PII, credentials, tool secrets). Page-level encryption is mandatory for production.
